content: **july 2nd 2018 dragon cal** a cal crochet-along means the pattern will be released in parts according to a schedule if you join in you will post a photo of the part you have finished then wait for the next part to be released we all finish the pattern together around the same time part 1 ~ here 1 part 2 ~ here 2 part 3 ~ here 3 part 4 ~ here 4 part 5 ~ here 5 part 6 ~ here 6 part 7 ~ here 7 bonus how to name your dragon 8 **update pattern now on one page** the different parts are still available along with all the video tutorials but i do now have this pattern all on one printable page for free here 9 **the small but mighty dragon ** date of creation june 2018 height 7 1/2 inches 19cm wing span 7 3/4 inches 19 6cm moveable legs are jointed arms and head will move color variety fire breathing yes **languages available ** my original pattern in english here 10 christina stjernholm translated in danish available on facebook here 11 gaby lehrbach translated the pattern in german here 12 **more info and dates here 13 ** **absolutely nothing to do with this cal** i write stories sometimes about my amigurumis for the kids the latest story i wrote is here 14 it s about the dragon learning to breath fire i hope you enjoy the wizard is a free pattern here 15 the girl will be a free pattern asap 1 https //www amigurumitogo com/2018/07/small-dragon-crochet-along-part-one
